==== Notes ====

Bluetooth support had to enabled using the Omnibook modules from SourceForge.  GeForce Go 7 video card wasn't detected correctly.  Had to manually set.  System goes into standby and hibernation, but doesn't come back cleanly.  X has to be restarted, along with most services.
